objectives.title: Develop Business Leaders
objectives.description: Build strong analytical, decision-making, and leadership skills through rigorous academic training and practical exposure.

objectives.title: Industry Readiness
objectives.description: Preparing students for immediate employment in multiple sectors through industry-aligned curriculum and internships.

objectives.title: Ethical Leadership
objectives.description: Instilling values, responsibility, and professional integrity to create socially responsible business leaders.

objectives.title: Strategic Thinking
objectives.description: Develop ability to analyze complex business situations and formulate effective strategic solutions.

objectives.title: Team Collaboration
objectives.description: Enhance interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively in diverse teams and cross-functional environments.

objectives.title: Innovation & Entrepreneurship
objectives.description: Foster entrepreneurial mindset and innovation capabilities to drive business growth and create value.
